1.title: Kofi Mbili Challenge
1.plot: In this episode we feature highlights of what happened when we were away. We highlight Bensouda's challenges with the ICC cases, we also highlight former president Moi's ninetieth birthday. Jomo Kenyatta's experience in Nyanza is compared to President Uhuru's recent visit to Nyanza, in Politricks. Also highlighted is a section of "Kofi Mbili" challenge!

2.title: Acting President Ruto
2.plot: As the saying goes, when the big cat is away, the small cats will tear the house down. He may burn down the village, take some prisoners and run off with all the cattle, but that cannot happen in forty eight hours... or can it? We find out in this week's episode of the XYZ Show.

3.title: Battle for Supremacy
3.plot: In this episode, The XYZ Show explores the battle for supremacy between the CORD political alliance and the Jubilee political alliance. It also highlights the trends of Kenya's top leadership right from independence to the current age. The exploitation of Kenyans by their presidents through the ages for their loyalty and lack of information is also highlighted in this episode.

4.title: Counter Pandemic
4.plot: We are under attack and no, it is not by terrorists this time, but by foreign diseases such as Ebola. But are we as a country prepared for such a pandemic? XYZ seeks the answers for questions unanswered. What are our leaders doing about this. Have our Cabinet Secretaries come up with a solution to ensure that We are safe?

5.title: Kenyatta's Performance
5.plot: President Uhuru Kenyatta may seem laid back to many but just like an onion, he has many layers. Cabinet Secretaries and others in Key positions recently had the misfortune to peel back the onion, with tears in their eyes. Watch as Uhuru Kenyatta, gets a lesson in the countries leadership from his late father, Jomo Kenyatta, the first president of Kenya.

6.title: Evolution of MCAs
6.plot: Our MCA's have become infamous for displaying a single minded focus in the pursuit of their own happiness over that of Kenyans and the country at large. This episode of The XYZ Show takes a look at evolution of MCA's and the hope that history may provide the answers to the present and future leadership.

7.title: Land Inceptions
7.plot: The land saga in Kenya continues to unfold like a Mexican soap opera with horrible actors, and a director who has lost all direction. Lands Cabinet Secretary Charity Ngilu constantly presents contradictory information that has more twists and turns. In this episode we also highlight the CORD leader Raila Odinga, with a major discord in his political party, with calls to oust him. Is it time for change?

8.title: Political PR
8.plot: The XYZ Show pays tribute to a man who loved to sing, a man who was ready for Mapambano, and a man who provided great satirical content for the XYZ Show, the late Homa Bay Senator Otieno Kajwang. Before featuring how president Uhuru Kenyatta puts the political PR in his presidential title.

9.title: Country's Insecurity
9.plot: President Uhuru Kenyatta is a man under a lot of stress, and and one of them is the rise of insecurity in the North Eastern region of Kenya. Who will help the Commander in Chief take command of the situation, and who will take the blame? Watch this episode to find out who will help the president know how to tackle this issue.

10.title: Shaking Up the Security Docket
10.plot: Kenyans continue to express outrage over increased insecurity as more fatalities occur in Mandera. With the exit of Ole Lenku and Kimaiyo, the president and his new team are left to grapple with the monster of terrorism. How did we get here? The XYZ Show explores the ups and downs and the ins and outs in Politricks.

11.title: ICC Ruling
11.plot: It is a day of jubilation in the Jubilee Government as the ICC drops ethnic violence charges against president Uhuru Kenyatta. However, Deputy president William Ruto still remains in the dock house as his case and that of former radio presenter Joshua Arap Sang continues. The XYZ Show sought people's opinions on the matter.

12.title: Crumbling Currirulum
12.plot: The teacher's strike is back with promises of prolonged power plays and forced holidays for the kids, all this as teachers focus on their dues the Education system continues to be a subject that remains out of focus. The XYZ Show takes a closer look on this neglected sector which raises more questions than answers.

13.title: Best of XYZ Show
13.plot: In this season's finale, we review the season that has been, which tackled stories ranging from the countries insecurity problems to stripping of women, to unholy pastors, miracle workers, veterans café. In a Christmas special, we retell the Nativity story of the birth of the messiah, but with a twist..!

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Kenyan women start a political sex boycott, XYZ host interviews Ruto and Martha and the two prominent MPs engage in a High Noon-style duel.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: The country prepares for Madaraka day, Uhuru calls Moi for help on his budget speech, and XYZ host Jonah Lessit talks to the Kenyan and Ugandan spokesmen about the touchy Migingo island issue.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Barack Obama proves that he is Kenyan enough, XYZ host Jonah Lessit talks to the singing Pastor and a Somali pirate explains his business.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Raila and Ruto find ways of coping with the recession, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews former President Moi, and Raila and Kalonzo get into a fight about a toilet.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Uhuru reads the budget, Kalonzo gets a bright idea to ascend to the throne without an election and Kibaki dodges a shoe.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: The principles eat it all up at the national prayer breakfast, Unga long lasting lollipop quenches your hunger in three flavors and Bifwoli Wakoli rants at a funeral.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Osama Bin Laden reacts to Obama's Cairo speech, Kibaki and Raila confess what's on their minds, and Uhuru, Martha and Ruto bring out their best singing voices in XYZ Project Fame.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Kalonzo takes a break to have a hair do, Kibaki and Raila play cards in jail in XYZ Prison Break and XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews both of them on The Hague issue.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: The honorable Members of Parliament ask for yet another salary raise, Raila emulates his cousin Barack Obama and Michael Jackson goes to heaven.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Kalonzo tries to get back into ODM, Kibaki and Raila are still in jail in XYZ Prison Break and XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews Dr. Goldstein about mental jiggers.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Kalonzo celebrates the Hague process, Barack visits Africa but chooses Ghana over Kenya, and it's Raila's, Kalonzo's and Kibaki's turn to perform in XYZ Project Fame.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews police spin master Eric Kiraithe, the three principals face it off in the Power Challenge, and Ruto and Uhuru join Kibaki and Raila in XYZ Prison Break.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Jonah Lessit presents the best of the best of the season as well as an exclusive look behind-the-scenes of the show in this season 1 finale.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Kibaki and Raila visit the Kofi Annan Anonymous marriage counseling office, XYZ host interviews former president Moi, and SuperOcampo makes his entrance on the local scene.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: ICC prosecutor Luis Moreno-Ocampo puts Uhuru on the witness stand, then joins XYZ host Jonah Lessit and Mutula Kilonzo for an interview, and the "No" camp meets in secret to plot to defeat the proposed new constitution.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Mwaniki sells some Dubai degrees at a good price, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews Raila and Ruto, and the "Yes" camp hold a secret constitution meeting.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: The Kenya police have a new answering machine, G4S, the security company also known as Gone in 4 Seconds, advertises their services, and the principals try to cut a deal with the ICC.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Kofi Annan tells Raila to stop whining, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews Presidents Zuma and Kibaki, and unknown forces attack the draft constitution under the cover of the night.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Kenyans discuss the future at the jobless corner, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews Kalonzo and Ocampo experiences what the Kenyan witness protection program has to offer.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Kenyans come together against negative ethnicity, political forces conspire to sabotage the draft constitution and Osama bin Laden is infuriated by Obama's road map to peace in the Middle East.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: William Ruto consults his mentor retired President Moi on how to acquire land, Kenyan women discover the Automated Tithing Male and the World Cup fever catches up with the political establishment .

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: "Who Really Owns Kenya" looks at Moi's business assets, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews a Christian and Muslim representatives on the draft constitution, and Martha, Ruto and Bifwoli show what they can do in "Bunge's Got Talent".

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: The Political Hygiene Soap cleans all signs of graft, Al Shabaab terrorists crack down on World Cup viewing, and XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews Chelsea's Didier Drogba.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Chinedu sells transformer oil, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews a panel of football experts, and Bishop Wanjiru, Kibaki and Raila, and Kalonzo face off in "Bunge's Got Talent".

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: After his surgery Raila received a strange mix of visitors at the hospital, we wonder what if Kenya hosted the World Cup, and Abrigast Arap Luor has a conspiracy theory on the draft constitution.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: The best clips from the past 12 episodes.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Pastor Chinedu promises husbands to the women of Kenya, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews Kamlesh Pattni, and Sudanese dictator Omar Al Bashir crashes the promulgation ceremony for Kenya's new constitution.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: Raila gives an exclusive tour of his new office in "XYZ Cribs", XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews Francis Atwoli, and reporter NoButt Nagirr investigates the body parts trade.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: Martha sings "Survivor", XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews Bishop Wanjiru, and NoButt Nagirr gets into great danger in part 2 of his investigative report on the body parts trade.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: The principals raise money to implement the new constitution, XYZ host Jonah interviews PLO Lumumba, Sonko takes us on a ride for a day and a night.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: ICC prosecutor Ocampo interrogates the usual suspects, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews with Ugandan President Yoweri Museveni and Kamlesh Pattni welcomes us to his crib.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: The Clande 69 app helps your phone hide your clande, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews with President Kibaki and the police start their recruiting exercise.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: Ruto thrives even after being booted from the cabinet, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews US ambassador Michael Ranneberger, and politicians exhibit juvenile conduct in "Bunge High.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: Kenya's anti- graft knight PLO Lumumba interrogates a suspect, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews William Ruto, and veteran African heads of state discuss Grace Mugabe's infidelity.

9.title: Episode #3.9
9.plot: Ruto implicates Raila in the post-election violence, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews House Speaker Kenneth Marende, and ICC suspects take a reconnaissance tour of The Hague.

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: Charity Ngilu tries to dry up the water scandal, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews Kalonzo, and Ugandan President Museveni sings another rap.

11.title: Episode #3.11
11.plot: Politicians star in Safaricom's Niko Na Bahati ad, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews government spokesman Alfred Mutua, and NoButt Nagirrr investigates the coaching of post-election violence witnesses.

12.title: Episode #3.12
12.plot: Catholics are strangely elated when the condom ban is lifted, XYZ host Jonah Lessit interviews one of the infamous Artur brothers, and our "Untold Stories" segment looks into Songo's criminal cases.

13.title: Episode #3.13
13.plot: XYZ host Jonah Lessit highlights the best of Season 3.

1.title: Episode #4.1
1.plot: In this Hague special, ICC Prosecutor Luis Moreno-Ocampo prepares for the biggest fight of his career, the new XYZ Show host Keff Joinange interviews judge Ekaterina Trendafilova, and Six2Hague sings "End of the Road"

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: In this episode of The XYZ Show, Kibaki adopts baby Ruto, the continent's strong men react to Laurent Gbagbo's arrest, XYZ host Keff Joinange interviews Martha Karua, and NoButt Nagirrr infiltrates Kenya's dangerous drug trafficking underworld.

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: In episode 3, Kenyans struggle with the rising price of fuel, Keff Joinange interviews Energy Minister Kiraitu Murungi, Ruto and Uhuru legalize their strange marriage, and Ruto and Raila remix Mejja's "Niko Poa".

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: Raila starts his search for a 2012 presidential running mate, XYZ host Keff Joinange interviews COTU Secretary General Francis Atwoli, departing US Ambassador Michael Ranneberger criticizes Kenya's war against drugs in '24' style, and Mike Sonko misbehaves in "Bunge High"

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: The Kenyan government is not spared by the fuel shortage, Martha Karua bursts into a secret succession meeting, The XYZ Show's host Keff Joinange interviews Barack Obama about Osama bin Laden's death, before the US President offers a remix of Tupac's "Hit Them Up".

6.title: Episode #4.6
6.plot: Much is revealed when Osama bin Laden's home videos are released, XYZ host Keff Joinange joins Muammar Gaddafi in his bunker, Big Brother Africa returns with a fresh cast of house-mates, and the embattled Libyan leader Gadaffi sings "My Prerogative".

7.title: Episode #4.7
7.plot: Uganda's President Yoweri Museveni is sworn in for a 10th term, DSK receives legal advice from Jacob Zuma, and XYZ host Keff Joinange interviews Mike Sonko before the flamboyant MP takes on Kleptomaniaxx's "Tuendelee Ama Tusiendelee."

8.title: Episode #4.8
8.plot: The Roman Catholic Church opposes the nomination of Chief Justice Willy Mutunga, the Ruto-Uhuru alliance is under stress in "Cheaters", XYZ host Keff Joinange interviews Prime Minister Raila Odinga, and Francis Atwoli sings "Ugali Sosa"

9.title: Episode #4.9
9.plot: We take a look back at how the Mututho law came to pass, XYZ host Keff Joinange interviews Postmaster General Hussein Ali, the Nigerian High Commissioner is recalled for assaulting his wife, and Raila Odinga sings "Kigeugeu"

10.title: Episode #4.10
10.plot: Yagnesh Devani awaits his extradition to Kenya for the Triton scandal, XYZ Cribs visits the home of PLO Lumumba, while show host Keff Joinange interviews Deputy Prime Minister Uhuru Kenyatta and Kalonzo Musyoka sings "Pii Pii"

11.title: Episode #4.11
11.plot: Kenyans find new ways to cope with the harsh economic situation, The XYZ Show host Keff Joinange interviews Zimbabwe's Robert Mugabe, NoButt Nagirrrrrrr investigates the Free Primary Education scam, and three powerful women sing "Single Ladies"

12.title: Episode #4.12
12.plot: Kenyan MPs refuse to pay their back-dated taxes, the drama following the death of Olympic champion Samuel Wanjiru continues, The XYZ Show host Keff Joinange interviews Parliament Speaker Kenneth Marende and the Hague Six sing "Sina Makosa"

13.title: Episode #4.13
13.plot: In the season finale, The XYZ Show host Keff Joinange highlights the most memorable clips of Season 4 and meets his human counterpart Jeff Koinange.

1.title: Episode #5.1
1.plot: The confirmation hearings are on-going at The Hague. Meanwhile Bifwoli Wakoli opens the doors to his crib, and The XYZ Show host Keff Joinange interviews PLO Lumumba. NoButt Nagirrrrrrr looks into the increasing Chinese presence in Kenya, and PLO takes up the mike with a remix of "Siamini".

2.title: Episode #5.2
2.plot: In this episode, Uhuru Kenyatta opts to be his own witness at The Hague. We look into illicit brews and the resulting tragedies, and Keff Joinange interviews Mike Sonko. Pastor Chinedu is back in Kenya, and the Hague Six sing "Tokelezea"

3.title: Episode #5.3
3.plot: "What If" Martha Karua was president? We also take a look the death toll from fuel siphoning accidents, and Keff Joinange interviews ICC prosecutor Luis Moreno-Ocampo. On-the-run former Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi sings "Can't Catch This".

4.title: Episode #5.4
4.plot: The XYZ Show takes a look back at the White House secret meeting with Mungiki, the Hague 6 are back in Kenya and in style, XYZ host Keff Joinange interviews Uhuru Kenyatta, Robert Mugabe undergoes a medical exam, and Kibaki and Uhuru sing "It Wasn't Me".

5.title: Episode #5.5
5.plot: Esther Murugi welcomes our crew to her crib, Keff Joinange interviews Bifwoli Wakoli, politicians pay their respect to late Nobel Prize winner Wangari Mathai, NoButt Nagirr looks into the fall of the shilling, and Ruto and Uhuru remix "Kare".

6.title: Episode #5.6
6.plot: Kenya launches retaliatory attacks on Somalia after foreigners were kidnapped on her soil, reactions to Muammar Gaddafi's death are pouring in, Keff Joinange interviews president Mwai Kibaki, and Chinedu and Wanjiru sing "Nwa Baby"

7.title: Episode #5.7
7.plot: The Somali community is feeling the heat of the war against Al Shabaab, MPs push for the establishment of a Kenyan NASA, Keff Joinange interviews Barack Obama, and the PNU coalition presents a remix of "Windeck".

8.title: Episode #5.8
8.plot: The Kenyan Treasury repays some of the stolen education money to DFID. The XYZ's Keff Joinange interviews First Lady Lucy Kibaki, Kenyans are getting used to living under stringent security measures, and Martha Karua and Mike Sonko sing "Kwaheri".

9.title: Episode #5.9
9.plot: The Kenyan government reacts to shocking revelations about drug trafficking, the G7 alliance is showing some cracks, Vice President Kalonzo Musyoka shows off his new residence in XYZ Cribs, XYZ host Keff Joinange interviews Alfred Mutua, and KDF ft Al Shabaab present "Hotstepper".

10.title: Episode #5.10
10.plot: Kenyan MPs debate the election date, we take a look at "What If" Atwoli was president, The XYZ Show host Keff Joinange interviews William Ruto, students protest against lecturers' unpaid salaries, and Chinaman sings "Kung-Fu Fighting".

11.title: Episode #5.11
11.plot: A wave of controversial demolitions cause havoc, the KPLC releases a new charter of service among frequent blackouts, Keff Joinange interviews House Speaker Kenneth Marende, Kalonzo Musyoka rebrands his party, and Mwaniki sings "Vunja Mifupa/Manyumba"

12.title: Episode #5.12
12.plot: The Hague Six are awaiting their fate, the building demolitions continue and reach State House, Keff Joinange interviews Al Shabaab spiritual leader Sheikh Hassan Dahir Aweys, and your favorite characters get together to present their version of "Feliz Navidad" - Merry Christmas!

13.title: Episode #5.13
13.plot: In the season finale, presidential candidate Martha Karua and Government Spokesman Alfred Mutua stop by the XYZ studios for a chat and The XYZ Show host Keff Joinange takes us through the best clips of the season.

1.title: Episode #6.1
1.plot: The XYZ Show exposes the winners and losers of the budget, our reporter Kijana Kutweng explores how death transform people from thieves into visionaries. The show also introduces a new feature "Cash Money Pastors and Prayers for us all".

2.title: Episode #6.2
2.plot: The XYZ Show goes behind the scenes to see exactly how the Youth Fund was disbursed, Obama and some African leaders have a chat on his recent support for the gay community, and No Butt Nagirrrrrrr investigates the sudden and mysterious cost increments of basic commodities.

3.title: Episode #6.3
3.plot: The NHIF scandal has taken Kenya by storm- Keff Joinange interviews the always jovial Francis Atwoli, and Kibaki and Raila perform a collaboration with the MRC (Mombasa Republican/Raha Council).

4.title: Episode #6.4
4.plot: The XYZ Show takes a critical look at Kibaki's 2013 succession plans, Kenya's education sector is failing, and, four years later, the country's first post election violence suspect is finally convicted.

5.title: Episode #6.5
5.plot: The XYZ Show's investigative reporter No Butt Nagirrrrrr goes undercover to investigate the poor working conditions of house helps, Obama issues a travel alert to Kenya due to the possibility of a terror attack, and Ruto performs Maino's All the Above!

6.title: Episode #6.6
6.plot: In this episode, we explore the crackdown on hate speech and who it may affect, as well as the banning of persons running for elective office from conducting Harambees - is there a way to beat this law? And Museveni, Moi & Mugabe unite to sing Forever Young!

7.title: Episode #6.7
7.plot: In this episode, The XYZ Show unearths exclusive footage of what really happened in the Ezekiel Kemboi drama. Miguna Miguna joins Keff Joinange on set for a fascinating interview on his just released controversial book, and presidential aspirant Martha Karua performs a remix of Tiwa Savage's Kele Kele Love.

8.title: Episode #6.8
8.plot: Mwaniki checks up on athletics before the London Olympics, Raila gives his opinion on Miguna Miguna, all before Raila and Miguna collaborate on a hot Ohangla track.

9.title: Episode #6.9
9.plot: Keff Joinange gets up-close and personal with Musalia Mudavadi, we explore the vibrant Sino-Africa relationship, and Bishop Maggie defends herself with "I'm not a Gold Digger" in our political hit segment.

10.title: Episode #6.10
10.plot: In this episode, Keff gets up-close and personal with presidential aspirant Eugene Wamalwa. Raila Odinga is displeased by his son Fidel for divorcing a Kikuyu and presidential aspirants try their best to woo their running mates in a Busy Signal remix.

11.title: Episode #6.11
11.plot: The XYZ Show investigates the dismal performance of the Kenyan team in the just concluded London Olympics. We also take a look at the features of the new parliament's Kshs 200,000 seats and Keff Joinange interviews BBA's Prezzo.

12.title: Episode #6.12
12.plot: With the recent crash of Ugandan Military choppers, The XYZ Show digs into just how the choppers are procured. We take a look at the booming trade in South Sudan and our very own fickle politicians sing the party hoppers' anthem.

13.title: Episode #6.13
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Episode #7.1
1.plot: In this season 7 premiere episode, we look at what would happen if Sonko became Nairobi senator, an investigative report takes on the senior fake police, and an electric performance of Gangman Style tops off the show.

2.title: Episode #7.2
2.plot: So why did Kibaki approve the hefty retirement package? XYZ reveals. Bishop Margaret Wanjiru is accused of having fake university degrees and Keff Joinange interviews the CORD Alliance.

3.title: Episode #7.3
3.plot: The XYZ show looks into the embarrassing political party nominations as well as the varied managerial styles of Nairobi political aspirants Kidero & Waititu. Kibaki and Moi "Make it rain" with their hefty retirement packages in this week's political hit.

4.title: Episode #7.4
4.plot: Just when you're about to lose hope on Kenyan media, they pull a surprise and come together to host a presidential political debate. The XYZ Show did a rendition of it.

5.title: Episode #7.5
5.plot: Keff Joinange interviews the two leading aspirants of the much contested seat of Nairobi's Senator - Mike Sonko and Bishop Margaret Wanjiru.

6.title: Episode #7.6
6.plot: It's one week to the March 4th Elections. XYZ uncovers politricks; the various methods politicians are wooing voters. We also feature the much awaited Azonto Remix.

7.title: Episode #7.7
7.plot: The night before the elections, The XYZ Show features a special episode. We look at the presidential candidates' last moments, our feature "What If" explores what if Dida became president and our political hit is performed by Emilio himself.

8.title: Episode #7.8
8.plot: The curtains fall. After a peaceful and successful elections, the XYZ Show talk to the losers, their perspective and what next for Kenya. We also look at the situation, where a good number of people left the country expecting post election violence

9.title: Episode #7.9
9.plot: In this episode we feature Vice President-elect's trademark cries - are they crocodile tears? We look at the the aftermath of the elections: how the losers are coping and how the winners are celebrating.

10.title: Episode #7.10
10.plot: Keff Joinange interviews a man who knows a lot about Kenyan politics-some people even consider him a prophet... We also take a look at the new government taking office.

11.title: Episode #7.11
11.plot: In this episode, Uhuru Kenyatta is fully taking advantage of his position as president-elect. The XYZ Sho looks into a certain controversial condom advert, and NoButt Nagirrrrrr investigates what really happened at the IEBC.

12.title: Episode #7.12
12.plot: After a unanimous Supreme Court Ruling, The XYZ Show's Keff Joinange takes it up-close and candid with Chief Justice Willy Mutunga

13.title: Episode #7.13
13.plot: The CORD team seeks guidance from the spirit world. Also, the top political hits on the season as voted by the audience on the season finale of The XYZ Show.

1.title: Episode #8.1
1.plot: A recap of first 100 days of the new government and much more.

2.title: Episode #8.2
2.plot: What happens when you're not Prime Minister anymore? Is the Media sleeping with the government? And what not paying government employees may lead to. This and much more.

3.title: Episode #8.3
3.plot: The XYZ Show creates a rendition of Shark Tank, where the president and the vice president are the sharks and the governors come to pitch development ideas for their counties. We also look at the suspects of the JKIA fire - who's the guilty one?

4.title: Episode #8.4
4.plot: A look at the implementation of the Jubilee laptop project, opposition leader Raila Odinga's fight for a referendum and the fake degree scandal that has affected a number of politicians.

5.title: Episode #8.5
5.plot: XYZ's Uhuru goes to Russia and China to seek investment opportunities, while Keff gets to speak to Raila. We explore issues pertaining to tax, police reforms and the 'tyranny of numbers'.

6.title: Episode #8.6
6.plot: The XYZ Show visits William Ruto at The Hague. We also take a look at the new VAT on milk and how it's affecting Kenyans.

7.title: Episode #8.7
7.plot: The spotlight is on Nairobi county leadership - we feature crazy incidents that have rocked Nairobi County in the week. From governor Kidero slapping the women representative, to the senator Sonko insulting a radio presenter on air.

8.title: Episode #8.8
8.plot: The XYZ Show takes a look at the ICC trial of deputy president Ruto, and the witnesses. Keff interviews Nairobi Senator Mike Sonko

9.title: Episode #8.9
9.plot: Keff Joinange interviews minister for interior defense on the Westgate terror attack. The commander-in-chief meets with security heads, and we present a national anthem by The XYZ Show family.

10.title: Episode #8.10
10.plot: XYZ's host Keff interviews the President Uhuru on the state of security in Kenya. The XYZ Show continues to discuss the issue of insecurity following the Westgate terror attack.

11.title: Episode #8.11
11.plot: The XYZ Show interrogates the African Union's stand against the ICC, and much more.

12.title: Episode #8.12
12.plot: The XYZ Show takes you through the KDF's operation in Westgate after the terror attack - what exactly was entailed in 'securing the building'? Learn this and much more in episode 12.

13.title: Episode #8.13
13.plot: The season's best skits, as well as a wrap-up of the major news stories that marked season 8.

1.title: Episode #9.1
1.plot: Museveni speaks to Keff Joinange about homosexuality, Uhuru and Ruto woo Ocampo in the hopes that he will witness in their favor at The Hague, and retired presidents Moi and Kibaki present the Lazy Song!

2.title: Episode #9.2
2.plot: We explore the lengths to which churches are going to attract the youth, and how our resident hustlers Mwaniki is capitalizing on Lupita Nyong'o's fame by selling 'Lupita' beauty products, and much more!

3.title: Episode #9.3
3.plot: In this episode we take a look at the Preachers of Nairobi, the recent government move to reduce salaries, Uganda's 'Miniskirt bill', and much more!

4.title: Episode #9.4
4.plot: Parliament recently passed the Marriage Bill - we explore the repercussions of this law, and begin out series "Who cons Kenya?" These, and more!

5.title: Episode #9.5
5.plot: The Amazing Chase - on the trail of county money. Where has the money gone, since disbursement from the treasury? We also interrogate the value of Nairobi's morning radio shows.

6.title: Episode #9.6
6.plot: In this episode, Ruto enjoys being on the acting presidential seat, and one man wants Waithera, Nyasuguta and Nafula!

7.title: Episode #9.7
7.plot: The battle is on between Labor Unions COTU and PUSETU: who shall be the champion?

8.title: Episode #9.8
8.plot: The proposed digitization process: what should we expect? Will it be added to Kenya's ever-expanding list of scandals?

9.title: Episode #9.9
9.plot: Student leaders have turned to mediocre ways of leading that are fueled by greed and power. We also assess the first year under the Jubilee government.

10.title: Episode #9.10
10.plot: In this episode we look at the Anglo-Leasing scandal and the large pay outs that are intended. We also spend a day with IGP Kimayo, the man responsible for our security.

11.title: Episode #9.11
11.plot: XYZ's "The Road to the East" continues, as we ask the question "Who Is Kenyan Now?"

12.title: Episode #9.12
12.plot: CORD officials are stranded on a sinking ship, while XYZ's Politricks looks at Africa's 'Feast in the East.' Retired president Moi also gives his views on the state of the nation.

13.title: Episode #9.13
13.plot: The season finale looks back at some of the audience favorites from season 9!

imdb.title: The XYZ Show
plot: A Kenyan political satire program featuring latex puppets.::Anonymous
